header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: To do list, arrangements during the week, birthday party arrangements, gymnastics show, anime and TV, geology and faults, learning Japanese online, making dinner, avocadoes, movies, kids at school being mean, plans for visiting London & UK, @Bristol science centre, Ravioli,
header.activity: Discussion with ANON about what to do in the week while making dinner.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
